Subject: How do i retrieve a page's last modified date?

Hi all,

I am writing a multidimensional search engine: www.net2map.org. 
I am currently rewriting the crawler part, using a very simple 
Processor which extracts all the useful information from the
CrawlURIs it receive, and feeds them to the Lucene indexer.
In the CrawlURI, i have found many informations about the URL
being crawled, but not the date and the HTTP headers.

How do I retrieves these pieces of information?

Thank you in advance for your answer!
